title: Choosing the Right Source of Credit
description: This chapter explores different sources of credit, how to compare them, and strategies for making informed borrowing decisions. Students will learn about various credit providers, analyze borrowing scenarios, and develop a personal framework for responsible credit use.
learning_objectives: Differentiate between various sources of credit such as banks, credit unions, and payday lenders
Compare terms, interest rates, and fees associated with different credit options
Evaluate creditworthiness factors and determine appropriate credit sources
Analyze real-world scenarios to assess borrowing decisions' impact on financial health
Create a decision-making framework for responsible borrowing
Develop strategies to avoid high-cost predatory lending
